item.title: @@@APPNAME@@@ version @@@VERSION@@@ is available
item.description: The @@@APPNAME@@@ developpement team is pleased to announce the @@@VERSION@@@ release! You can download this new version here: @@@WEBSITE@@@/download.html Full changelog available at: @@@WEBSITE@@@/changes-report.html Have fun! The @@@APPNAME@@@ development team.
item.content:encoded:
The @@@APPNAME@@@ developpement team is pleased to announce the @@@VERSION@@@ release!

You can download this new version here: @@@WEBSITE@@@/download.html

Full changelog available at: @@@WEBSITE@@@/changes-report.html

Have fun!

The @@@APPNAME@@@ development team.
